description: Hello, I am Urfan Karimli. I have over a year of experience in Frontend Development. I have worked both in an office environment and as a freelancer. My expertise is primarily in React.js and Next.js, but I can also code using other JavaScript libraries. I have the ability to quickly learn any necessary technology when needed. I possess strong adaptability to different work environments, effective teamwork skills, and leadership abilities.
qssjobrow1: Review colleagues' codes and provide feedback to improve code quality.
qssjobrow2: Code optimization and debugging to ensure performance on different devices and browsers.
qssjobrow3: Efficient development of components for optimization of components and maximum performance.
qssjobrow4: Built dynamic, high-performance pages using Next.js, leveraging SSR/SSG for optimal SEO and loading speeds.
qssjobrow5: Enhanced UX with Framer Motion by implementing smooth animations and micro-interactions, improving user engagement.
qssjobrow6: Integrated multi-language support via next-intl, enabling seamless localization for international audiences.
